name: logseq
description: Logseq is a privacy-first, open-source note-taking and knowledge management tool that uses a local-first approach. It supports visual graph views, Markdown, backlinks, and plugins with optional sync.

features.title: Knowledge Graph
features.description: Visual graph view, Bidirectional links, Connected thinking. See relationships between notes

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Privacy-focused, Offline-first, File-based storage. Your data stays on your device

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Plain text files, Portable format, Future-proof. Notes you can always access

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality, Community plugins, Custom workflows. Make Logseq yours
